text: [[col:red]]One of the Royal Djinn will unlock for every two Pieces of Eight attained.[[/col]]

The Great Sultan has finally returned to rule over all of Araby, and those who once conspired against him shall now pay the price of their hubris. Expel the foreigners, then take war to their lands once more - Sultan Jaffar shall rule supreme!
[[col:red]]One of the Royal Djinn will unlock for each milestone achieved during Jaffar’s Revenge.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This unit becomes available once your allegiance to Araby reaches 100%.[[/col]]
The last selected Arabyan army will receive a unit of Slave Rabble. The army must be within player-owned territory. Cost: 200[[img:icon_money]][[/img]].
Jellaba's Way||Dispatch trade caravans along Ibn Jellaba’s Way - each route carries its own perils and potential riches.
